My Update to the AutoCompleteExtender

HI ,

 I was asked to work on the beta    AjaxControlToolkit Patch Utility Tool from the Asp.Net AjaxControlToolkit Forums .

  My first fix , which allows the first result in a result set to be automatically selected  ( if chosen to ) , has been made part of the codebase

and will be in the next release of the Toolkit .

Youc an see me in the Hall of Fame .

 

Default Behavior , With "FirstRowSelected" set to false.

 

Behavior after My patch is part of the AjaxCotnrolToolkit , With "FirstRowSelected" set to true.

Link to the WorkItem my fix resolves   Be able to have the first row selected Title is required.

Hope this helps !!!

Written on May 24, 2007
